StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_MIDeleteProgramMOSCodes]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ContractID int, @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @DBID int DECLARE @DBNAME sysname DECLARE @ErrMsg varchar(100)
SELECT @DBID = DB_ID(), @DBNAME = DB_NAME()
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PROGRAM_MOS_CODES WHERE CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID) BEGIN --- BEGIN TRANSACTION
--- UPDATE THE USER LOGIN BEFORE WE DELETE THE PROGRAM_MOS_CODES RECORD UPDATE PROGRAM_MOS_CODES SET USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID
--- DELETE THE PROGRAM_MOS_CODES RECORD DELETE FROM PROGRAM_MOS_CODES WHERE CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID
IF @@ERROR != 0 OR @@ROWCOUNT = 0 BEGIN --- ROLLBACK TRANSACTION SET @ErrMsg = 'An error occurred dele.ng the PROGRAM_MOS_CODES history record for Contract ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, @ContractID) + '.' RAISERROR (@ErrMsg, 16, 1, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
--- COMMIT TRANSACTION END
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
